name: Emily Johnston
text: The best meals.  Never had a morsel that wasn't delicious. And since I have an issue with portion control and over eating, this keeps me in control!

name: Chasity Lowe
text: Food portions are always perfect! The food is always fresh and flavorful! Ordering is so convenient, especially for a teacher. Coming home in the evenings, I have my plate full and do not have the time to make myself healthy meals for lunch. I always enjoy the times that I am able to order from Port City Preps because it is easy and the meals are spot on for what I need. During the pandemic when they started offering the take and bake family meals, these were also so wonderful! My family sometimes passes like ships in the night around dinner time so it was great to have something better than a bowl of cereal or a frozen pizza that we could all enjoy together without having to stay up til 8 or 9 to cook a meal. Would recommend this company to anyone! Great food! Great customer service! Great people!

name: Katie McGraw
text: I have been ordering meals for about a month and every single plate has been phenomenal! Perfect portions of delicious food.

name: Reid Smith
text: The food is incredible. The website is extremely user-friendly. I’ve never had any trouble and they are very timely and efficient with your orders definitely recommend to anyone looking to eat healthier in a much easier way than cooking when you don’t have the time.

name: Amy Rowe
text: Port City Preps is the most excellent food delivery service I've ever used. The menu is always expanding, the food is always fresh and delicious and the prices can't be beat. I seriously would spend more at a fast food joint every day but with Port City Preps, I can have HEALTHY food delivered directly to me at home or at work for a price that always fits my budget. I HIGHLY recommend Port City Preps!

name: Courtney Haupt
text: I use Port City Preps as a meal prep company for myself and gym athletes. You can trust the ingredients and all the nutrition info is easily labeled on the website and food packaging and that is something that is important to me. I have also used Port City for several catering events and the Craig has always been able to work within whatever budget I had.  Craig was also able to come up with some creative and delicious ideas that everyone at the event loved - not to mention there was always extras!

name: Samantha Catlett
text: Port City Preps catered my wedding in June 2020, they did a phenomenal job! All of our guests raved over the bacon wrapped scallops, broccoli balls, crawfish bread, and chicken kabobs! The staff was extremely professional and took excellent care of our guests. The display was beautiful. They had to overcome a venue that was entirely outdoors on a very humid summer night, they pulled off our 100 person buffet style reception without issue! I very highly recommend. You will not be disappointed and neither will your guests.

resp.text: Thank you Samantha for taking the time to leave a review of your experience, and thank you even more for letting us be apart of your special night! It was a beautiful wedding, and we were so happy to be apart of it.

name: Josh Williams
text: Their Big Mac wraps and fried rice bowls are great.

name: Alexis Dove
text: Owner and Head Chef Craig does not disappoint. He uses fresh, local ingredients to create delicious meals. From take and bake casseroles to healthy individual meal preps I’ve never had a meal that I would not reorder. The added convenience of Port City Prep’s delivery services makes ordering from them a no brainer!

name: Kristen Haring
text: I was lucky to have Port City Preps cater my wedding. The food was amazing and was everything that we envisioned. Craig was very good about staying in communication with me. They set up and cleaned up and made it one less thing for me to worry about on my big day!

name: Tristian “Willis” Grove
text: They make healthy food taste like unhealthy food if that’s what you want. The menu varieties is what keeps me using their services!!

name: Jack Morrisroe
text: We have used this business multiple times for both catering and family meal orders. The quality of the food and freshness of the ingredients make port city preps stand out. The reliable and experienced catering service brings us back as a repeat customer.

name: Jordan Barbarin
text: I absolutely love these meals, my family gets them weekly! I love the fact that they rotate the menu and are constantly adding new things. It makes it a lot easier to stay on tract. The creative spin these guys put on some of these meals is nuts, things you wouldn’t think to make at home. All around 5 stars. I do recommend!

name: Victoria Jones
text: Loveeeee Port City Preps! Been using Chef Craig’s services for over a year now. I get the weekly meal plan and hand select all of my meals for the week. The food is always fresh and delicious. When I started my weight loss journey, I was struggling with the diet part. So I began using Port City to help count calories, fat, etc and it was PIVOTAL for me! I lost so much weight thanks to his easy meal plans. I also plan on using Port City to cater my wedding! Will always highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this review! We appreciate you for being a long term customer more than we can express, and we look forward to sharing your big day with you!!

name: Ellen Talbot
text: Craig is talented and his food is incredible! His presentation as a caterer is also really impressive, the total package for sure. This team would be a great choice for any event!

name: Chelsea Moore
text: My family loves PCP! Having the food delivered straight to my front door saves me so much time! The food is very fresh and taste amazing and customer service is spot on. Highly recommend!

name: mandy parker
text: Great food and just as great customer service. Makes eating healthy enjoyable AND easy with delivery. Definitely recommend!

name: Sean Phillips
text: I have tried other meal prep companies but Port City is a step above. Chef Craig's meals are next level. Keep it up guys!

name: Ellen Talbot
text: Craig is talented and his food is incredible! His presentation as a caterer is also really impressive, the total package for sure. This team would be a great choice for any event!

name: lonnie brown
text:
ive been ordering from Craig for a couple years now! The food is always fresh and juicy(grilled chicken). he's helped an on the go, really busy Dad lose 35+ lbs  by providing healthy, clean, and delicious meals :)
he got a customer for life over here!

name: Atutudes
text: Delicious healthy food, reasonably priced, and delivered. Win/Win/Win. I have thoroughly enjoyed everything I have received. Chef Craig is a gifted chef.

name: Sean Phillips
text: I have tried other meal prep companies but Port City is a step above. Chef Craig's meals are next level. Keep it up guys!

name: Jessica White
text: Delicious and healthy meals! I order on Sunday, my food for the week is delivered to my office on Monday morning. It makes eating healthier the easiest thing ever, without sacrificing tasty food!

name: Josh Williams
text: Their Big Mac wraps and fried rice bowls are great.

name: HankMardukas15
text: This place makes it easy to eat healthier. Place an order and they deliver the next day. They offer very healthy options that taste well above average. It has changed the way we eat. Very happy with service as well. They will only continue to get better as the business grows.

name: Tyler Kennedy
text: I've been buying several meals per week for over a year now, all delivered, and can't think of a single issue ever occurring. Food is great, healthy, and service is excellent.

name: Lauren Sanders
text: Incredible food & top notch customer service. It makes this ER Nurses life less chaotic when it comes to deciding what to bring for lunch & I know it’s going to taste wonderful & is healthy!!

name: Keefe Ollis
text: Great food!! Went to a wedding they catered and wow!! Ended up buying from the meal prep side of the business! Keep it up!

name: Allissa Willamor
text: This place catered my wedding and let me tell you, I was more excited to eat at my wedding than anything! They let us come in and taste different things. They cooked us up something special since I don’t eat meat and it was the best thing I’ve ever had. They were very prepared with everything and even went to the venue the day before the wedding to get a feel of the kitchen. The set up was very classy and they kept everything stocked and nicely kept. Paper plates, cutlery, and napkins were provided as well. They were very attentive and picked up plates during the reception. We didn’t even have to lift a finger. When everything was finished they cleaned up and packed up and left everything spotless like they weren’t even there. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a caterer for any event!

name: Jessica White
text: Delicious and healthy meals! I order on Sunday, my food for the week is delivered to my office on Monday morning. It makes eating healthier the easiest thing ever, without sacrificing tasty food!

name: Susan Harris
text: My absolute favorite meal prep! Delicious food, and wonderful staff!

name: lonnie brown
text:
ive been ordering from Craig for a couple years now! The food is always fresh and juicy(grilled chicken). he's helped an on the go, really busy Dad lose 35+ lbs  by providing healthy, clean, and delicious meals :)
he got a customer for life over here!

name: Marissa Hodge
text: Amazing food and you can’t beat the prices

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review, and thank you for being a customer!

name: Jeremy Day
text: It has something for everyone, the variety of different food that is made is great for everyone’s taste in food.

name: Larry Onderdonk
text: Port City Preps is always fresh delicious and on time! Highly recommend!!!

name: Anthony Arnold
text: Top notch service & food is great!

name: Kyle Sweetser
text: Great company, great staff, great food!

name: XtotheY *
text: One of the premier catering companies in the Southeast!

name: Ashton Johnson
text: Excellent service. Great food. Tetrazzini is delicious.

name: Kandi Nichols
text: Great food. Love it when Ashley and Brandi sing there!!!

name: Anonymous
text: Drive thru or dine in!

name: Trish Styles
text: There food is 👍

name: Katie Moerschel
text: Awesome

name: Leigh Wright
text: Hands down, the best place for catering. Food is delicious and reasonably priced

name: Deborah Wilson
text: Absolutely the best, food and Service.

name: Irene Golson
text: I have enjoyed attending several of this group's plays. I guarantee you will enjoy many laughs at any performance you choose. Food is always tasty and FREE wine all night long will definitely make you smile.

name: Rendie Smith
text: We had a blast!! Can't wait till next month.

name: Al W.
text: ursula showed up and scared me since she was still talking about ariel

name: Ashley Crim- Smith
text: Best place in downtown Prattville!!! They've got AMAZING pre-cooked dinners/casseroles that are so easy for quick dinners. And the BEST chicken salad ever!!! ... The boutique and antique shop inside have cute and unique items, highly recommend this place to anyone!!

name: Shelley Kim
text:
I don’t get a chance to get to Prattville that often, but when I do, I make sure to stop by here to purchase some casseroles and soups.

Connie, the owner, is a real sweetheart and very much involved in her business, always there to greet with you with a smile and help you out.  I think it’s so important to support your local mom and pop stores, while benefiting from food that is lovingly home made.  You can’t go wrong!

name: Joe Garrick
text: Good place to go in and get what you need prices are high but a in and out is good

name: MBB
text: Their casseroles are great and they offer so much more.

name: Chuck
text: These casseroles are excellent. The chicken salad and pimiento cheese are delicious.

name: David Pressley
text: Great homemade food!!

name: Hannah Barnes
text: I bought a squash casserole, a container of chicken salad and a container of pimento cheese. I went home and made lunch out of the pimento cheese and the chicken salad and it was wonderful, wow it was so delicious. I will be having the squash casserole for dinner tonight. 😀

name: JJ JJ
text: Highly recommend! My son loved the beef stroganoff and Hashbrown Casserole. We will definitely be back!!!

name: Carol Meeks
text: This place is so very pleasant & helpful. From shopping or to have a great meal.

name: Abigail Corbett
text: I love ordering their casseroles to go. Such a great quick meal or meal to take to a friend.

name: kayla dismukes
text: loved the whole place food was wonderful yummy chicken. salad lots to see will. go back

name: Marissa Wiles
text: Very disappointed in this store. Went in with my husband today to look around. Was trying to just find some cute jewelry. Unfortunately, we were subjected to a soap opera from the "manager" behind the counter and her friend in the store. We got to hear all about how the gentleman in her life was still talking to his ex and she would beat his a**. This is not professional for a work environment. The conversation was loud enough to be heard across the entire store. We left without purchasing anything due to the atmosphere there. I'll be highly surprised if I visit again.

resp.text:
Hi Marissa,

My name is Connie - I am the owner and manager of Fanci Free. Thank you for taking time to leave a review and bringing this incident to my attention.  I was not in the store on the day of your visit, but as soon as I heard what happened I made several unsuccessful attempts to contact you. I discovered this written review about your experience only last week.

I wish to extend my sincere apologies to you and your husband. I want you to know I have personally addressed the situation.

At Fanci Free, we value each and every one of our customers. We have a long-standing reputation of making our boutique and café a place where everyone feels happy and leaves happy. I am so glad that you enjoyed the quality and appeal of Fanci Free (as reflected in your ratings) - but on the day of your visit, we fell short of our overall mission.

As a token of our appreciation for your patronage, and to make amends, I invite you to return and enjoy a free meal with us. Then I will be happy to help you find that cute jewelry you were looking for - we have plenty to choose from!

Please call and ask for me (Connie Dismukes).

I look forward to meeting you and your husband. Thank you again for your comments and helping us to continue providing the best service and customer experience in the downtown Prattville area.

Connie Dismukes, Owner & Manager - Fanci Free Café & Boutique

name: Jennifer Lane
text: Okay if you're in a jam, but takes twice as long to cook as they say.

name: Teresa Ingram
text: Try the chicken spaghetti. Just WOW!

name: Anthony A. II (HanLikeAMF)
text: The Poppyseed Chicken Casserole is the absolute bestest.

name: nay redd
text: Wish the portions were bigger for the prices

name: LaNissa Burton
text: Christines Unlimited catered our Christmas party. The food & service was incredible. Desserts were out of this world and the chicken was so tender. I think anybody who's having a wedding or any kind of party should definitely use Christines Unlimited.

name: Tommy Duke
text:
My wife and I celebrated our 19th wedding anniversary last night and we topped it off by going to Christine's Unlimited for the wine tasting event.
The wines were very good and the price was very reasonable, of course the hors d'oeuvres were fantastic. Thanks to Christine and her staff for making our night with them special.

resp.text: Thanks Tommy for coming and I enjoyed finally to meet your wife.

name: Jenna
text: Kind and helpful employees! Can't wait to eat my spaghetti. I got the loaded chicken salad and it's delish!

name: Shannon Nash
text:
Tried Home Plate cooking for the first time since moving to Helena. We stopped by to get the daily special, chicken and dressing with Lima beans and sweet potato casserole.

Dressing was a traditional cornbread dressing like grandma used to make with large chunks of white chicken throughout.

Lima beans were nicely seasoned and fresh. Sweet potato casserole was hot and sweet with candied pecans on top.

Daily special was great, but what impressed me was the large variety of home cooked “take and bake meals”.

Will give the “take and bake” a try in the future.

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Home Plate Cooking is AMAZING!! I ordered several casseroles for my family who are so hard to please. No complaints! It was incredibly delicious! The prices are fantastic. The communication was excellent. The food was packed safe and secure.  We will be placing another order next week.

name: L B
text: This place is as good as your southern grandmothers cooking. It’s definitely the taste of home. Homemade family recipes. Catering top notch, hot lunch plates to die for. Family run business that treats customers like family.

name: Desiree Miller KW Realtor
text: No cooking for me tonight! 😁

name: Ann Garner
text: Fabulous food. My husband & I are disabled and  Home Plate Cooking is a Godsend for us. Real home cooking with wonderful meats, vegetables & desserts & much more. Casseroles & Catering! We love it.

name: FORDMAT77
text: Haven't tried anything from them that wasn't really good yet, great service

name: Jusdoinme Stace
text: Always will stop by Home Plate Cooking in Helena. I have a dish in the freezer now.  Saving for when I don't want to cook.

name: Mark Aultman
text: Really good food.  Take and bake.  Chicken spaghetti is awesome.

name: Amanda Nutton
text: I love Helena Home Plate.  All of there food is amazing.  For lunch I really enjoy the box wraps with the broccoli salad.  And for Dinner I love getting the steak tips and rice and corn.  It is so great to have them in Helena, and to have an option of fresh food.  I recommend everyone to stop by and try.  they also are amazing with catering.

name: Mike Adelberg
text: The best Food Hands Down, very clean, and professional, friendly place.

name: Emma Hassler
text: Friendly Mangement and good food making you feel right at home.

name: Ann Lichty
text: LOADED CHICKEN SALAD that totally ROCKS!  I've had beef tips and rice, chicken and rice, chicken and dumplings, shrimp and grits, it is all fantastic.  But if you want out of this world get the lasagna! Wholly Cow!  It was awesome!  The girls work really hard there to be sure your order is ready and perfect.  If you haven't been to home plate,  your still on first base.

name: Sally “Sally” M
text: Just got a plate for lunch containing beef stroganoff fried corn and green beans.  The stroganoff was awful.  Only thing I tasted was fried onions and mushrooms.  There was no beef.  Worst food ever.

name: carol scott
text: Wonderful food, very clean and relaxing atmosphere and nice people.

name: Ashley Shearer
text: Ordered beef stroganoff, was delicious. Has a diverse menu for all different size orders and is definitely worth little extra to have food heated for you if your order is not being saved for later

name: Teresa Smith
text: Love this place! You can get all kinds of meals for your family or friends in need.  The food is always great and tasty. They have tables available if you want to eat there for lunch. They have individual serving meals and wraps. I eat their chicken wraps alot, but everything is good. Everyone is so nice and welcoming.

name: Molly Killingsworth
text: I visited the restaurant for the first time on yesterday, after hearing great reviews. I ordered the beef tips & rice to have for dinner so we didn’t have to cook. The food was delicious, very flavorful, and definitely worth the cost. This has quickly become my new favorite place to eat!  I can’t wait to try the other prepared meals.

name: Teresa Smith
text: Love this place! You can get all kinds of meals for your family or friends in need.  The food is always great and tasty. They have tables available if you want to eat there for lunch. They have individual serving meals and wraps. I eat their chicken wraps alot, but everything is good. Everyone is so nice and welcoming.

name: Harold Watters
text: All around excellent. Service staff is very friendly and helpful. Very clean facility. Food, meals and desserts, are absolutely wonderful. Don't pass up an opportunity to take advantage of their services and eat inside.

name: Daniel Holmes
text: Excellent caterer! Home Plate Cooking catered our office Christmas party last night it was delicious. I highly recommend them for your next event.

name: Chris Fancher
text: Delicious food at reasonable prices. Great option for when you don't feel like cooking we're going to the grocery store. They take checks and I have a drive-thru window.

name: Vicki Kimbrell
text: Great! Love cake balls and food delicious. First time !!!!

name: Wood Isbell
text: Good staff and quick service here. The food was good without standing out. Family friendly and homey food.

name: mike crumpton
text: Great place. Awesome food. Great staff

name: Jeannette Morgan
text:
We got a hamburger potato casserole tonite since I had surgery this past Monday.
It was Devine. Thanks so much

name: Jill Wegener
text: Good home cooked food. Delicious desserts too!

name: Cynthia Mosley
text: The freshness of the food and the great customer service.   They treat their customers as if they are family.  I love getting meals to take home and just reheat.

name: Darla McMullen
text: Huge selection - and even more with 24hr notice! Sweet, helpful staff. Oh, I forgot - the food is delicious!

name: jd
text: Portions can sometimes be rip off small and have been like that for years. The food is for the most part pretty good most of the time.

name: Lee Pate
text: Eaten meals from here several times and have had nothing but a great experience each time. From the Daily Specials to the meal selection in the front display,  I have only had delicious food.

name: Caroline Dempsey
text: LOVE their take-and-bake entrees - so convenient for busy moms & taking dinner to families at church. My daughter & hubby love their chicken pot pie; it's a full meal & so impressive looking (yet priced well). Hot plates are great lunches to take teachers (hint, hint 😉).

name: never (Sonshine)
text:
Today I took my grandson for a Birthday Cookie, and he loved it!!! This IS where you pick your dinner up! You may have to put it in the oven for 30 minutes, so much better than having to make it those days you don't feel like cooking!!!
Everything is wonderful! Easy Menu and choices of how many you need to feed,  equates the price. They have hot dinners, chicken salad and a host of casseroles, Breakfast & Dinner, sides, and over 15 Cake options to order.

name: Leelee Gaissert
text: Love all of their wonderful home cooked meals and german chocolate cake!!!!!

name: Linda Phillips
text: Great  Sweet potato casserole and broccoli salad. The to go plate lunches are awesome

name: Lee Gaissert
text: Wonderful home cooking, always fresh,and my absolute favorite is the german chocolate cake. Always nice to have a hot home cooked meal, since I have no time to cook. Never disappointed.

name: Brooke Watkins
text: I've been driving by Home Plate Cooking twice a day for almost a year, and my boyfriend's request for chicken pot pie finally brought me in yesterday. The first thing I noticed was how clean it was inside. The workers were extremely friendly, and the welcoming atmosphere persuaded me to buy MUCH MORE than the chicken pot pie. I cooked the pie as soon as I got home, and it was FANTASTIC. I will definitely be frequenting this place, especially on nights I don't have time to cook! Easily five stars!

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: This is one of my favorite places to eat. From their lunch plates, to their dinners, and most importantly their desserts; everything is so well made. And the prices are so affordable.

name: Angela Fox
text: Mrs Kay is the best. There has not been one thing she serves that I have absolutely not loved. Best place to get a hot plate of a meat and veggies around.

name: MARTHA CORVETTE
text: First time to this type of restaurant and was very impressed.  Food was great we will return and will use in the future for catering needs.

name: Paul DeCarlo
text: I've ordered dinner a number of times from Home Plate Cooking and always enjoyed the quality and taste.  The desserts are great and our daughter loves their Coca Cola Cake.  They have meals to go and do catering.  Check out their website for daily specials.  They make it easy and quick to get in/out with dinner ready to go.  Thanks! Paul DeCarlo, RE/MAX Southern Homes

name: Brooke Riley
text: So tired of their hot plates always being sold around 1:30 make more please! The food is great when you can get some. Also portions are very small.

name: Marlene Carver
text: Awesome food and excellent customer service. Our go to place for dinner

name: Phillip Chase
text: Been doing business with them for 3-4 years always great.

name: Jane Gibbons
text: Nice staff Gooood food

name: Jacie Lovell
text: Stopped there for the first time today and got a hot plate of chicken and dressing, black eyed peas, sweet potato casserole,  and corn bread. It was delicious and a good price.  I highly recommend this place.

name: Miller Boys
text: LOVE this place! A go-to place for quick dinners for the fam and always solid for work events!! Thank you Home Plate Cooking!!!

name: Paul Todd
text: Fantastic food!!! Great help

name: L. K.
text: Fantastic food, friendly service, reasonable prices. Love the squash casserole, poppy seed chicken, broccoli salad and pizza casserole! Drive thru is convenient, too.

name: Joyce Fancher
text: Very good. Will go back. 100 health score.

name: Kelly Moore
text: I enjoyed the food however so fat I haven't been In LOVE with anything. It would be good to take to a grieving family or busy household as a gift.

name: Tiffany Chapman
text: I ordered a chicken pot pie.... Yummy it was huge. (A family pie) thick crust. Chunky chicken. The hashbrown casserole was delish. Poppyseed chicken. All were yum.

name: Mary Margaret McDonald
text: Delicious food.  Nice and friendly staff. Ways a smile on their faces. Yummy desserts!!

name: Katrina Helms
text: Stopped and got some hot plates for me and the coworkers!!!! So delicious!!!! Love this place and everyone is so nice!!!

name: Keith Harless
text: Love it.  Great food that is home cooked.

name: Cole Hassler
text: Great customer service, food and hospitality I love going there and getting food they always keep me coming back again and again

name: Jonathan Bartlett
text: Awesome food, awesome people and awesome service. Highly recommended for dining in, carry out and catering

name: Robby Tolbert
text: Great food, great service.

name: Mary Pace
text: Always good food and fast friendly service!

name: Hugo Picon
text: Great food, no need to invest 2 hours a day for dinner prep.

name: Adam Haas
text: This restaurant is full of great people. Everyone is so friendly and make you feel welcomed.

name: Josh Williams
text: Great food served with a smile

name: Rene Gilbert
text: Great home style cooking. Good prices.

name: Terry Pitman
text: Sweet potato casserole and Pecan pie is excellent!

name: Janice Reed
text: Cozy, casual atmosphere; friendly people and delicious food @/reasonable prices. Can't beat this combination!

name: Jessica Burk
text: The food is top notch and the place is clean! I often buy dinner for the Family here when I'm to tired to come up with something.

name: Marry Masson
text: Great food and always helpful staff!

name: Cheryl Tidwell
text: Great place to eat and the prices are good.

name: Maurice Adkins
text: Yummylicious. Super friendly and helpful staff.

name: Jonathan Edwards
text: Great food!!

name: Phoebe Hollenquest
text: Great food

name: Sherri Vaughn
text: Great food and good people

name: Angie Cacioppo
text: Great food and deserts!

name: Lindsey Richardson
text: Always great

name: Rosemarie Nelson
text: Love this place!

name: Greg Williams
text: They cook, you eat! Couldn't be simpler........

name: josh yarbrough
text: Need to eat here.
